metadata.Title: CVE-2012-2398 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in files/ajax/download.php in ownCloud before 3.0.3 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the files parameter, a different vulnerability than CVE-2012-2269.4.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-2398` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

owncloud - 4.0.7debian-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> owncloud packages in Ubuntu are now empty

criterions.comment: owncloud package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.0.7debian-1ubuntu1').
